import React from 'react'; import './MainPageTest.css'; class MainPageTest extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {booksList: []}; } componentDidMount() { fetch('https://favael-webshop.herokuapp.com/book') .then(response => response.json()) .then(jsonResponse=> { this.setState({booksList: jsonResponse}); }) } renderList = () => { return this.state.booksList.map((book) => { return }) } render() { return(
